definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Democratic government gradually take the place of an all-powerful monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 民主政府逐渐取代了强大的君主制。

sentences.english: 1910 - Portugal overthrows its monarchy and declares itself a republic.
sentences.chinese: 1910年的今天，葡萄牙推翻君主制宣布共和。

sentences.english: Hannan also says the monarchy is part of the British national identity.
sentences.chinese: 汉纳还表示君主制是英国国民身份的一部分。

sentences.english: Feudal and monarchical maladies no longer run in our blood.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的血液里已不再存在封建制和君主制的病害。

sentences.english: Artists have been allowed to gleefully satirise the monarchy for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，艺术家都被允许欢快地讽刺君主制。

sentences.english: The people would rise in open rebellion if oppressed by a monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 如果遭到君主制的压迫，人民就会起来反抗。

sentences.english: The British have a proud tradition of monarchy and navy.
sentences.chinese: 君主制和海军一直是我们的骄傲。

sentences.english: I think in Jordan the Hashemite monarchy has a lot of good will.
sentences.chinese: 我在约旦哈希姆君主制觉得有很多良好的意愿。

sentences.english: In 1660 the monarchy was restored under King Charles II.
sentences.chinese: 1660年，查尔斯二世复辟，英国恢复了君主制。

sentences.english: Under the British influence, a monarchy was set up in 1907.
sentences.chinese: 1907年，在英国的影响下，不丹成立君主制政体。

sentences.english: For all these reasons, Hobbes concludes, a monarchy is best.
sentences.chinese: 霍布士论断，因为所有这些理由，君主制最完善。

sentences.english: The entire wedding has helped update the public image of the monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼的整个过程使得君主制的公众形象更加现代化。

sentences.english: A cornerstone of the Maoists' armed struggle was abolition of the monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 毛派武装斗争的基本目标就是铲除君主制。

sentences.english: Then there are the evolving attitudes to monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 那时对于君主制会有变化的态度。

sentences.english: Anti-monarchy groups have criticized the royal family for using public money to travel.
sentences.chinese: 君主制反对者批评皇室利用公众财务出游。

sentences.english: It's structured on monarchical and imperial ideas of politics.
